org.tinfour.gis.las

Class LasRecordFilterByClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tinfour.gis.las.LasRecordFilterByClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILasRecordFilter

    public class LasRecordFilterByClass
extends Object
implements ILasRecordFilter
    An example implementation of a vertex filter, accepts all records have the specified classification and which are not marked as "withheld".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LasRecordFilterByClass(int classification)
      Construction a filter that accepts only records with the specified classification.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(LasPoint record)
      Tests a LAS file record to see if it meets an application-specified criteria for acceptance into a vertex list.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LasRecordFilterByClass

        public LasRecordFilterByClass(int classification)
        Construction a filter that accepts only records with the specified classification.
        Parameters:
        classification - a value in the range 0 to 255 (values in the range 0 to 16 are the most common).

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public boolean accept(LasPoint record)
        Description copied from interface: ILasRecordFilter
        Tests a LAS file record to see if it meets an application-specified criteria for acceptance into a vertex list.
        Specified by:
        accept in interface ILasRecordFilter
        Parameters:
        record - a valid record from an LAS file.
        Returns:
        true if the record is accepted; otherwise, false.
